text: Earl Rogers Sayers was an American professor of biology and college administrator. He was educated at University of Illinois with a bachelor's degree in 1958. He later received a master's degree in 1961 and a Ph.D. in 1964 from Cornell University. He served as president of the University of Alabama from 1988 to 1996. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:University of Illinois alumni Category:Cornell University alumni Category:University of Alabama faculty Category:Presidents of the University of Alabama Category:Living people
title: Earl Rogers Sayers
